product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Sparkie Fire Starter - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies Sparkie Firestarter features a lightweight design that can be operated with one hand to start your fire with very hot sparks. Internal tungsten carbide striker allows simple 1-handed operation; user must press thumb button to engage the striker. Spring-loaded flint bar rotates 360deg to allow for even wear; bar retracts inside the body for compact storage. If the Ultimate Survival Technologies Sparkie Firestarter gets wet, simply wipe it off and it's ready for use. Overstock.
short_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies Sparkie Firestarter features a lightweight design that can be operated with one hand to start your fire with very hot sparks.
